user_query: I'm interested in buying a Bugatti Chiron and I want to know its fuel economy. Can you provide me with the city MPG, highway MPG, and combined MPG? Also, enrich the email address b.mohamed@tomba.io and give me the person's full name, position, company, and LinkedIn profile. Additionally, check if the email address is a webmail account.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the fuel economy specifications of a Bugatti Chiron, including city MPG, highway MPG, and combined MPG.
Enrich the email address b.mohamed@tomba.io to retrieve the person's full name, position, company, and LinkedIn profile.
Check if the email address b.mohamed@tomba.io is a webmail account.
